_json.description: THE SHEER WEIGHTLESSNESS OF SO MANY SERMONS- Why Expository Preaching Matters | If preaching is central to Christian worship, what kind of preaching are we talking about? The sheer weightlessness of much contemporary preaching is a severe indictment of our superficial Christianity. When the pulpit ministry lacks substance, the church is severed from the word of God, and its health and faithfulness are immediately diminished. - Dr. Mohler
